Class Reference

java.lang.Object
  Reference
All Implemented Interfaces:
Harvard, hasNotes
Direct Known Subclasses:
Book, ConferencePaper, Journal, Thesis, WebPage
public abstract class Reference
extends Object
implements Harvard, hasNotes

A class to manage reference for the program. Contain all the general attributes and methods necessarry that are needed to work with a reference This class is abstract Also work with objects contain inside a reference (references and notes)

Version:
2010.10.26
Author:
Tin Huynh
